scripts.init: npm run update; npm run build
scripts.update: rm -rf bower_components node_modules; npm update; bower update; dtsm fetch; dtsm update --save
scripts.start: http-server -o --silent -p 8000 & watchify lib/index.js --standalone NamedManager -o dist/NamedManager.js -v & coffee -c -w -o lib src/*.coffee
scripts.build: coffee -c -o lib src/*.coffee; browserify lib/index.js --standalone NamedManager -o dist/NamedManager.js
